attachments.title: Harmonix developing for Samsung Gear VR
attachments.text: Harmonix, the studio behind Rock Band and Dance Central, is working on something for the newly announced Samsung Gear VR headset, according to a tweet from publicist Nick Chester. Chester said...

attachments.title: Fireproof announces The Room Three for iOS and Android, Omega Agent for Gear VR
attachments.text: The Room Three, the third entry in Fireproof Games' series of mechanical puzzle games, is in development and scheduled to be released in spring 2015, the studio announced today. According to a...

text: Man, what a glorious day in VR and gaming tech
